20101221074503.000|20101221074505.000|CC1|SCENARIO AND ONE THE CHINESE ARE

20101221074505.000|20101221074510.000|CC1|>> WHAT IS THE SCENARIO THAT THE
20101221074510.000|20101221074512.000|CC1|PEOPLE FIGURE IS MOST REALISTIC 
20101221074512.000|20101221074514.000|CC1|AND MOST FEARFUL.

20101221074515.000|20101221074516.000|CC1|U.S. THE MOST AND THE ONE THAT

20101221075200.000|20101221075202.000|CC1|A $7.4 BILLION AID PACKAGE BUT  
20101221075202.000|20101221075203.000|CC1|EARLIER THIS MONTH THE          
20101221075203.000|20101221075204.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN FILIBUSTER HELD UP   
20101221075204.000|20101221075207.000|CC1|THE BILL'S PASSAGE IN THE       
20101221075207.000|20101221075207.000|CC1|SENATE.                         
20101221075207.000|20101221075208.000|CC1|THE SENATE IS EXPECTED TO VOTE  
20101221075208.000|20101221075209.000|CC1|THIS WEEK ON A NEW VERSION OF   
20101221075209.000|20101221075212.000|CC1|THE BILL THAT BRINGS THE COST   
20101221075212.000|20101221075212.000|CC1|DOWN.                           
20101221075212.000|20101221075213.000|CC1|AT CITY HALL TODAY, NEW YORK'S  
20101221075213.000|20101221075214.000|CC1|MAYOR BLOOMBERG SPOKE ABOUT THE 
20101221075214.000|20101221075217.000|CC1|IMPORTANCE OF PASSING THE BILL. 
20101221075217.000|20101221075219.000|CC1|>> THIS IS NOT A VOTE ON WHETHER
20101221075219.000|20101221075223.000|CC1|WE SHOULD INCREASE THE DEFICIT. 
20101221075223.000|20101221075224.000|CC1|IT'S A VOTE ON WHETHER WE SHOULD
20101221075224.000|20101221075225.000|CC1|STAND BY THOSE WHO STOOD BY     
20101221075225.000|20101221075227.000|CC1|AMERICA IN ITS HOUR OF GREATEST 
20101221075227.000|20101221075227.000|CC1|NEED.                           
20101221075227.000|20101221075229.000|CC1|>> Rose: LAST WEEK, JON STEWART 
20101221075229.000|20101221075232.000|CC1|OF "THE DAILY SHOW" DEDICATED

20101221075301.000|20101221075302.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN CAROLYN MALONEY.

20101221075322.000|20101221075325.000|CC1|THE DEMOCRATIC LEADERSHIP.

20101221075326.000|20101221075330.000|CC1|DOES NOT PASS BEFORE CHRISTMAS,

20101221075350.000|20101221075351.000|CC1|ATTACK, CHARLIE.

20101221075354.000|20101221075357.000|CC1|I'M NOT GOING TO BE TAKEN CARE

20101221075403.000|20101221075405.000|CC1|>> WHAT'S THE EXPLANATION THEY  
20101221075405.000|20101221075405.000|CC1|GIVE?                           
20101221075405.000|20101221075407.000|CC1|>> TWO ANSWERS ARE WELL, IT'S   
20101221075407.000|20101221075409.000|CC1|FOR NEW YORK, IT'S FOR NEW YORK.
20101221075409.000|20101221075410.000|CC1|BUT, CHARLIE, YOU AND I KNOW    
20101221075410.000|20101221075412.000|CC1|THAT THE TOWERS ARE OUR         
20101221075412.000|20101221075413.000|CC1|FINANCIAL DISTRICT AND WAS      
20101221075413.000|20101221075415.000|CC1|ATTACKED NOT AS NEW YORK BUT AS 
20101221075415.000|20101221075416.000|CC1|A SYMBOL OF OUR ECONOMIC        
20101221075416.000|20101221075418.000|CC1|STRENGTH, THE SAME AS THEY      
20101221075418.000|20101221075419.000|CC1|ATTACKED THE PENTAGON AS A

20101221075423.000|20101221075423.000|CC1|MILITARY.                       
20101221075423.000|20101221075425.000|CC1|AND ON 9/11 WE COMPLETELY       
20101221075425.000|20101221075427.000|CC1|CHANGED GOVERNMENTS.            
20101221075427.000|20101221075428.000|CC1|WE'VE COMPLETELY CHANGED OUR    
20101221075428.000|20101221075429.000|CC1|INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM.            
20101221075429.000|20101221075431.000|CC1|WE'RE IN TWO WARS BECAUSE OF    
20101221075431.000|20101221075431.000|CC1|9/11.                           
20101221075431.000|20101221075432.000|CC1|WE HAVE CHANGED ALL KINDS OF    
20101221075432.000|20101221075437.000|CC1|WAYS THAT WE REVIEW PEOPLE GOING
20101221075437.000|20101221075440.000|CC1|ON PLANES AND CARGO.            
20101221075440.000|20101221075440.000|CC1|WE'VE COMPLETELY CHANGED OUR    
20101221075440.000|20101221075441.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT BAUDS OF 9/11 YET THE
20101221075441.000|20101221075443.000|CC1|MEN AND WOMEN WHO WERE THE

20101221075446.000|20101221075448.000|CC1|AGAINST TERRORISM WE HAVE NOT   
20101221075448.000|20101221075449.000|CC1|TAKEN CARE OF THEIR HEALTH

20101221075451.000|20101221075453.000|CC1|SHORTLY AFTER PEARL HARBOR, WHEN
20101221075453.000|20101221075454.000|CC1|WE WERE ATTACKED WITHIN A YEAR, 
20101221075454.000|20101221075456.000|CC1|WE TOOK CARE OF THE VETERANS,   
20101221075456.000|20101221075458.000|CC1|THE PERSONNEL THAT CAME IN AND

20101221075557.000|20101221075559.000|CC1|OUT BECAUSE OF THAT COURT CASE  
20101221075559.000|20101221075601.000|CC1|HAS LOWERED THE COST OF THIS    
20101221075601.000|20101221075604.000|CC1|PARTICULAR BILL.                
20101221075604.000|20101221075606.000|CC1|THE MAIN WAY IT CHANGED IS THE  
20101221075606.000|20101221075607.000|CC1|PAY-FOR.                        
20101221075607.000|20101221075608.000|CC1|THE DEMOCRATS PAID FOR IT BY    
20101221075608.000|20101221075609.000|CC1|CLOSING A TAX LOOPHOLE.         
20101221075609.000|20101221075610.000|CC1|THE REPUBLICANS DID NOT LIKE    
20101221075610.000|20101221075612.000|CC1|THAT PAY-FOR.                   
20101221075612.000|20101221075613.000|CC1|SENATOR GILLIBRAND AND SENATOR  
20101221075613.000|20101221075615.000|CC1|SCHUMER HAVE COME BACK WITH A   
20101221075615.000|20101221075618.000|CC1|DIFFERENT PAY-FOR, ONE THAT     
20101221075618.000|20101221075624.000|CC1|INCREASES THE FEES FOR H. 1-B   
20101221075624.000|20101221075625.000|CC1|VISAS IN A CLEVER WAY OF        
20101221075625.000|20101221075626.000|CC1|INCREASING FEES FOR GOVERNMENT  
20101221075626.000|20101221075627.000|CC1|CONTRACTS THAT FOREIGN COUNTRIES
20101221075627.000|20101221075629.000|CC1|WHO GET OUR GOVERNMENT CONTRACTS
20101221075629.000|20101221075630.000|CC1|IF THEY WANT TO ALLOW OUR       
20101221075630.000|20101221075632.000|CC1|BUSINESSES TO DO BUSINESS THERE 
20101221075632.000|20101221075633.000|CC1|THEN THEY MUST PAY THIS FEE.    
20101221075633.000|20101221075634.000|CC1|SO IT THAT HAS PURPOSE OF       
20101221075634.000|20101221075636.000|CC1|RAISING THE REVENUE FOR 9/11 BUT

20101221075643.000|20101221075644.000|CC1|>> Rose: HOW MANY REPUBLICAN

20101221075656.000|20101221075658.000|CC1|WE HAVE THE VOTES NOW BUT WE'RE

20101221075659.000|20101221075700.000|CC1|>> Rose: AH.

20101221075728.000|20101221075729.000|CC1|>> WELL, WE HAVE BEEN URGING    
20101221075729.000|20101221075733.000|CC1|LEADER REID AND THE PRESIDENT,

20101221075737.000|20101221075740.000|CC1|WE GO TO THESE CONTINUING       
20101221075740.000|20101221075742.000|CC1|RESOLUTION TO MOVE IT QUICKLY   
20101221075742.000|20101221075744.000|CC1|THROUGH CLOTURE SO THAT THE TIME
20101221075744.000|20101221075747.000|CC1|THAT IS REQUIRED TO DEBATE IT

20101221075749.000|20101221075752.000|CC1|THEY COULD SEND IT BACK IN TIME.
20101221075752.000|20101221075754.000|CC1|OR SECONDLY WE COULD PASS THE

20101221075756.000|20101221075757.000|CC1|GET IT OVER THERE.              
20101221075757.000|20101221075759.000|CC1|BUT THE MAIN THING, CHARLIE, AS 
20101221075759.000|20101221075801.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, WHERE THERE'S A WILL  
20101221075801.000|20101221075802.000|CC1|THERE'S A WAY.                  
20101221075802.000|20101221075804.000|CC1|AND WE NEED THE POLITICAL WILL

20101221075806.000|20101221075807.000|CC1|COME TO THE TABLE WITH THE      
20101221075807.000|20101221075809.000|CC1|DEMOCRATIC LEADERSHIP AND JUST  
20101221075809.000|20101221075809.000|CC1|GET THIS DONE.                  
20101221075809.000|20101221075811.000|CC1|>> Rose: AND HOW MUCH... WHAT   
20101221075811.000|20101221075812.000|CC1|ROLE DOES THE PRESIDENT PLAY?   
20101221075812.000|20101221075814.000|CC1|>> WELL, THE PRESIDENT IS       
20101221075814.000|20101221075815.000|CC1|ABIMPORTANT LEADER.             
20101221075815.000|20101221075817.000|CC1|I WORKED WITH HIM ON THE CREDIT 
20101221075817.000|20101221075819.000|CC1|CARD BILL OF RIGHTS AND WHEN HE 
20101221075819.000|20101221075820.000|CC1|STARTED BEATING THAT DRUM AND   
20101221075820.000|20101221075822.000|CC1|CALLING FOR PASSAGE IT JUST SPED
20101221075822.000|20101221075822.000|CC1|THROUGH.                        
20101221075822.000|20101221075824.000|CC1|AND WE'RE AT THE NINTH INNING   
20101221075824.000|20101221075825.000|CC1|AND WE NEED A GOOD CLOSER.      
20101221075825.000|20101221075827.000|CC1|THERE'S NO BETTER CLOSER THAN   
20101221075827.000|20101221075827.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED     
20101221075827.000|20101221075828.000|CC1|STATES, PRESIDENT OBAMA.        
20101221075828.000|20101221075830.000|CC1|>> Rose: WHERE DO YOU STAND ON  
20101221075830.000|20101221075830.000|CC1|THAT?                           
20101221075830.000|20101221075832.000|CC1|GETTING HIM TO RAISE THE

20101221082436.000|20101221082436.000|CC1|WILL HARM US LONG TERM.         
20101221082436.000|20101221082438.000|CC1|I'D BE SURPRISEED IF IT HARMS US
20101221082438.000|20101221082438.000|CC1|LONG TERM.                      
20101221082438.000|20101221082439.000|CC1|THERE ARE PLENTY OF THINGS IT   
20101221082439.000|20101221082440.000|CC1|WOULD BE BETTER NOT TO HAVE HAD 
20101221082440.000|20101221082442.000|CC1|OUT THERE BUT I HAVE TREMENDOUS 
20101221082442.000|20101221082443.000|CC1|ADMIRATION FOR THE PEOPLE DOING 
20101221082443.000|20101221082445.000|CC1|THE WORK OF WRITING THOSE       
20101221082445.000|20101221082445.000|CC1|CABLES.                         
20101221082445.000|20101221082448.000|CC1|THEY'RE VERY SMART AND ENGAGED. 
20101221082448.000|20101221082451.000|CC1|I'VE BEEN A BIT SURPRISED BY THE
20101221082451.000|20101221082452.000|CC1|SHOCK SURROUNDING IT.           
20101221082452.000|20101221082453.000|CC1|>> WE DON'T KNOW THE            
20101221082453.000|20101221082454.000|CC1|CONSEQUENCES OF WHETHER PEOPLE  
20101221082454.000|20101221082455.000|CC1|LOST THEIR LIVES OR SOMETHING   
20101221082455.000|20101221082456.000|CC1|HAPPENED AND I SUSPECT MADE IT A
20101221082456.000|20101221082500.000|CC1|BIT MORE DIFFICULT FOR PEOPLE IN
20101221082500.000|20101221082502.000|CC1|TERMS OF... JOE BIDEN SAID ON   
20101221082502.000|20101221082503.000|CC1|THE WEEKEND THAT WHEN HE GOES   
20101221082503.000|20101221082505.000|CC1|FOR A MEETING WITH THE HEAD OF  
20101221082505.000|20101221082506.000|CC1|STATE THEY SAY "IT WILL BE JUST 
20101221082506.000|20101221082508.000|CC1|THE TWO OF US, NO AIDE TAKING   
20101221082508.000|20101221082508.000|CC1|NOTES."                         
20101221082508.000|20101221082510.000|CC1|>> IT'S AN ICE BREAKER, THOUGH, 
20101221082510.000|20101221082513.000|CC1|"YOU'RE NOT GOING TO WIKILEAK   
20101221082513.000|20101221082515.000|CC1|ME, ARE YOU?"                   
20101221082515.000|20101221082515.000|CC1|>> Rose: (LAUGHS)
